person.persName: Reuben Ridgeway (Jefferson, Kentucky, brickmaker and day laborer)

body.p: Jefferson, Kentucky, brickmaker and day laborer. Ohio native. Married to Martha Ridgeway. Father of Catharine Ridgeway, George Ridgeway, Wiliam Ridgeway, John Ridgeway, George M. Ridgeway, James Ridgeway, and Henry Ridgeway. Brickmaker in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Day laborer in Louisville in 1860.
